description: Let sigma_m (n) be result of applying sum-of-divisors function m times to n; let m(n) = min m such that n divides sigma_m (n); let k(n) = sigma_{m(n)}(n)/n; sequence gives k(n).
comments: See also the Cohen-te Reile links under A019276.
references: Graeme L. Cohen and Herman J. J. te Riele, Iterating the sum-of-divisors function, Experimental Mathematics, 5 (1996), pp. 93-100.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
